name: AnimatedFractionallySizedBox
info: An animated version of FractionallySizedBox, which automatically and smoothly transitions to the target size and position of the child component within the specified duration when the widthFactor or heightFactor changes, or when the alignment changes.

nodes.name: Animation Transition Effect
desc: In this case, the heightFactor, widthFactor, and alignment parameters are modified when clicked to view the animation effect.
